round 4 chain 2 half_double_crochet in the same stitch half_double_crochet in the next 2 sts 2 half_double_crochet in the next stitch around slip_stitch in the beginning chain two to join the round 32 half_double_crochet total round 5 chain 2 half_double_crochet in the same stitch half_double_crochet in the next 3 sts 2 half_double_crochet in the next stitch around slip_stitch in the beginning chain two to join the round 40 half_double_crochet total round 6-8 ch2 half_double_crochet in each st around 40 half_double_crochet finish off leaving a long tail for sewing the pieces together with white yarn and a yarn needle randomly sew little sesame seeds on over the st sewing bum together sew two of the circles together with a whip st making sure that they are right side out sew the other circle and the top together going through only the back loop of the circle stuff before it is completely closed burger with brown yarn make 2 round 1 chain 2 7hdc in 2nd chain from hook join w/ slip_stitch 8 half_double_crochet round 2 chain 2 do not turn counts as first half_double_crochet now and through out half_double_crochet in the same stitch 2 half_double_crochet in each st around slip_stitch to join the round 16 half_double_crochet total round 3 chain 3 half_double_crochet in the same stitch half_double_crochet in the next st 2 half_double_crochet in the next stitch around slip_stitch in the beginning chain two to join the round 24 half_double_crochet total round 4 chain 3 half_double_crochet in the same stitch half_double_crochet in the next 2 sts 2 half_double_crochet in the next stitch around slip_stitch in the beginning chain two to join the round 32 half_double_crochet total round 5 chain 3 half_double_crochet in the same stitch half_double_crochet in the next 3 sts 2 half_double_crochet in the next stitch around slip_stitch in the beginning chain two to join the round 40 half_double_crochet total finish off leaving a long tail for sewing the pieces together and in each st across 17 half_double_crochet chain 2 turn half_double_crochet across for as many row as you need to make a square approximately 14 row lettuce with green yarn round 1 chain 2 7hdc in 2nd chain from hook join w/ slip_stitch 8 half_double_crochet round 2 chain 2 turn counts as first half_double_crochet now and through out half_double_crochet in the same stitch 2 half_double_crochet in each st around slip_stitch to join the round 16 half_double_crochet total round 3 chain 3 turn half_double_crochet in the same stitch half_double_crochet
